2) GENERAL SCIENCE Multiple Choice Which of the following is NOT true regarding one mole of two different stable isotopes of the same atom? W) Both have the same number of molecules X) Both have the same mass Y) If used in the same chemical reaction, both produce the same number of moles of products Z) Both have the same number of protons
answer: X) BOTH HAVE THE SAME MASS

answer: Z) REDUCTION IN THE NUMBER OF CONSUMERS
